item.title: The Gift
item.description: It was June 8th,1974 and on a warm evening in the territory of Amap√°, now a state in the northern part of Brazil, a baby boy was born. Other than being a couple of months premature, the one thing that made this birth a bit more interesting than any premature birth was the fact that this baby had its hands and feet completely bent inwards, almost fused into his arms and legs.
